name: Are You Alone? (itch) (Rubix)
description:
PLEASE READ THE CONTROLS CAREFULLY

Are You Alone? is a 3d horror game made for Brackeys Jam 2022.2

Theme: You are not alone

You play as a teenager whose parents left him home alone, just to discover that you are being hunted by... ghosts? Find out what's going on before you go insane.

Programs used:

Unity Game Engine

3ds max

All sounds used in-game are from freesound.org

All materials used in-gamer are from ambientcg.com

Controls:

WASD | Move

Space | Jump

Left Shift | Crouch

Right Mouse Button | Interact

E | Consume Sanity Pills

Game  by: Rubix (me)

House Model by: HTH
